I experienced an episode where I lost consciousness while getting a tattoo. I sweated a lot, turned pale, and my arms and legs moved in a jerky fashion for a few seconds.

No, I do not have any history of serious illness and I am not currently taking any medications.

I don't have any information about my family history regarding cardiovascular or neurological disorders.

Final Diagnosis: Vasovagal syncope.
